topics.body: I wish there was a less time consuming way to add a gif ONTU another picture without creating 50 copies of it, putting the gif frames, frame by frame in between the copies and merging each one down, not to mention the per frame edits i had to do so thats why i only used 14 frames instead of the like 50 or so it had cause damn, thats a lot of time for something so simple heh.
